column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Decided to share an almond croissant with my sister
column3: and asked them to cut it in half for us. The girl at the pastry bar looked over to her supervisor
column4: asked him if they could cut it
column5: and he said no. Not really sure why. I asked again
column6: explaining that I didn't want to smush it by ripping it
column7: the supervisor directed me to use the silverware provided at the bus station. Not my idea of customer service.
